title: Configure Parameters for Dynamic Entry List
content:
In the Configure Parameters dialog, you configure the parameters that should be supplied to the dynamic entry list script when it's run. Click the Refresh Data button to run the script using the supplied parameters. If the script is a JavaScript script, you can also edit it in this dialog.

You can enter parameter values manually, or use the Select Token link in the gear menu to select a token value. To delete a parameter, select Delete Parameter in the gear menu.

In the Subscriber Options context, you can additionally use the Create Mapping link in the gear menu to configure an option property mapping. When a mapping has been configured, it can be updated using Update Mapping or deleted using Delete Mapping.

In the User Operations context, option property mappings aren't applicable; therefore, the Create Mapping, Update Mapping, and Delete Mapping links aren't present.

Related topics

  • For information on tokens, see Select tokens
  • For information on option property mapping, see Select Property to Map to Script Parameter
  • For information on how to use OPB endpoints, seeÂ How to use endpoints
  • For information on how to use OPB endpoints of DND in dynamic option properties, see Use case: OPB endpoints of Design and Deploy
